name: Curse of the Lich
description:
Play as a Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard in this bite-sized Rogue-Like!

This is the first entry in our 2023 one-game-per-moth challenge! It's a bite-sized rogue-like that pits a brave mercenary against an evil Lich and their heinous fiends.

Features:
  • Old-school rogue-like game-play
  • Multiple classes
  • Melee and ranged combat options
  • Magical scrolls and potions
  • Minimap
  • 7 Dungeon Levels

Please be aware that, as this is the output of a single-month's worth of work, there are already several known bugs - some of them game-breaking. This game is not in active development, and this release should be thought of as pre-alpha. 

Despite that, we had a lot of fun developing this little game, and we hope you get some enjoyment out of playing it.

Known Bugs:
  • When entering a new level of the dungeon, all enemies and items are briefly visible
  • Attempting to return to the main menu, after winning, and start a new game will result in a crash
  • Dying exits the game
  • It may be possible to start with a negative base attack (reported, but not reproduced)
  • Sometimes an enemy will be invisible

Like what we're doing? Check out our website: https://atomiccd.com/

Tips:
  • Player Level 1 is the hardest. Play carefully in the beginning.
  • Play slow. Death usually comes from carelessness
  • Starting stats are assigned randomly within constraints. A bad run one time, doesn't guarantee a bad run next time (and vice versa)
